name: swr-pagination
description: SWR-based pagination for transactions
code: const fetcher = (url: string) => fetch(url).then(res => res.json()); const {data isLoading} = useSWR(`/api/activities?page=${page}&limit=${limit}` fetcher { keepPreviousData: true }); const totalPages = useMemo(() => data?.total ? Math.ceil(data.total / limit) : 0 [data?.total limit])
imports_or_contract: import useSWR from 'swr'; import { useMemo } from 'react'
notes: keepPreviousData prevents flicker during page changes; calculate pages in useMemo

name: activity-summary-stats
description: Fetch and display activity summary statistics
code: const {data: summaryData} = useSWR('/api/activities_summary' fetcher); const stats = { dailyVolume: summaryData?.daily_volume_stx || 0 dailyVolumeUsd: summaryData?.daily_volume_usd || 0 uniqueAddresses: summaryData?.unique_addresses || 0 totalTxs: summaryData?.total_transactions || 0 }
notes: Aggregate metrics for dashboard; combine with STX price API for USD conversion

name: format-activity-type
description: Color-code transaction types in activity feed
code: const getActivityColor = (type: string) => { switch(type) { case 'BUY': return '#22c55e'; case 'SELL': return '#ef4444'; case 'TRANSFER': return '#3b82f6'; default: return '#6b7280' }}; const getBadgeClass = (type: string) => `bg-${getActivityColor(type)} text-white px-2 py-1 rounded`
notes: Consistent color coding: green=buy red=sell blue=transfer gray=other

name: token-deployment-flow
description: No-code token deployment with template replacement
code: const deployToken = async (metadata) => { const contractCode = await replacePlaceholders(templateCode { TOKEN_NAME: metadata.name TOKEN_SYMBOL: metadata.symbol TOKEN_SUPPLY: metadata.supply TOKEN_DECIMALS: metadata.decimals TOKEN_URI: metadataUrl }); const response = await request('stx_deployContract' { name: metadata.slug clarityCode: contractCode clarityVersion: 3 network: 'mainnet' postConditions: [paymentPostCondition] fee: 100000 }); return response.txid }
notes: Upload logo/metadata first; replace template placeholders; deploy with payment post-condition

name: flexible-deployment-payment
description: Accept multiple payment tokens for deployment
code: const buildPaymentPostCondition = (paymentToken amount userAddress) => { if (paymentToken === 'STX') { return Pc.principal(userAddress).willSendEq(amount).ustx() } else { const [contractAddr contractName assetName] = paymentToken.split('.'); return Pc.principal(userAddress).willSendEq(amount).ft(contractAddr + '.' + contractName assetName) }}
notes: Support STX or custom tokens (WELSH VELAR); calculate equivalent amounts; add 0.1% token allocation

name: metadata-upload-ipfs
description: Upload token metadata to IPFS via API
code: const uploadMetadata = async (tokenData) => { const metadata = { name: tokenData.name description: tokenData.description image: tokenData.logoUrl xlink: tokenData.twitter homepage: tokenData.website telegram: tokenData.telegram discord: tokenData.discord }; const formData = new FormData(); formData.append('file' new Blob([JSON.stringify(metadata)] {type: 'application/json'})); formData.append('type' 'uri'); const response = await fetch('/api/upload' {method: 'POST' body: formData}); return response.json().url }
notes: Upload logo first then metadata JSON; type='uri' for metadata type='logo' for images

name: presale-wizard-state
description: Multi-step wizard state management for presale creation
code: const [currentStep setCurrentStep] = useState(1); const [presaleData setPresaleData] = useState({ tokenAddress: '' softCap: 0 hardCap: 0 minBuy: 0 maxBuy: 0 tokenPrice: 0 liquidityPercent: 70 startBlock: 0 endBlock: 0 whitelistEnabled: false vestingMilestones: [] }); const nextStep = () => setCurrentStep(prev => Math.min(prev + 1 6)); const prevStep = () => setCurrentStep(prev => Math.max(prev - 1 1))
notes: 6-step wizard: token selection → parameters → AMM config → timeframe → vesting → deploy

name: vesting-milestone-config
description: Configure token vesting milestones for presale
code: const [vestingMilestones setVestingMilestones] = useState([ { blockHeight: startBlock + 2100 percentage: 25 description: 'First unlock' } { blockHeight: startBlock + 4200 percentage: 25 description: 'Second unlock' } { blockHeight: startBlock + 6300 percentage: 50 description: 'Final unlock' } ]); const totalPercentage = vestingMilestones.reduce((sum m) => sum + m.percentage 0); const isValid = totalPercentage === 100
notes: Block-based vesting; 2100 blocks ≈ 2 weeks; validate total = 100%

name: presale-participation-tx
description: Build presale participation transaction
code: const participateInPresale = async (presaleContract amount) => { const response = await request('stx_callContract' { contract: presaleContract functionName: 'participate' functionArgs: [] postConditions: [ Pc.principal(userAddress).willSendEq(amount).ustx() ] postConditionMode: 'deny' network: 'mainnet' fee: 100000 }); return response }
imports_or_contract: import { request } from '@stacks/connect'; import { Pc } from '@stacks/transactions'
notes: Post-condition protects buyer; contract validates min/max buy limits; check whitelist status first

name: claim-vested-tokens
description: Claim vested tokens from presale
code: const claimVestedTokens = async (presaleContract milestoneIndex) => { const response = await request('stx_callContract' { contract: presaleContract functionName: 'claim-milestone' functionArgs: [uintCV(milestoneIndex)] postConditions: [ Pc.principal(presaleContract).willSendGte(0).ft(tokenContract tokenName) ] network: 'mainnet' }); return response }
imports_or_contract: import { request } from '@stacks/connect'; import { Pc uintCV } from '@stacks/transactions'
notes: Milestone-based claiming; check block height >= milestone block; partial claims supported

name: lottery-status-fetch
description: Fetch current lottery round status
code: const getLotteryStatus = async () => { const response = await fetch('/api/lottery-4-winners/contract-calls/get-lottery-status'); const data = await response.json(); return { lotteryId: data.lottery_id active: data.active ticketsSold: data.tickets_sold totalRaised: data.total_raised goal: data.goal ticketPrice: data.ticket_price maxTickets: data.max_tickets winnerRevealed: data.winner_revealed winners: data.winners || [] }}
notes: Poll every 10 seconds while lottery active; update UI in real-time

name: buy-lottery-ticket
description: Purchase lottery ticket with STX
code: const buyTicket = async (ticketPrice) => { const response = await request('stx_callContract' { contract: `${lotteryAddress}.${lotteryContract}` functionName: 'buy-ticket' functionArgs: [] postConditions: [ Pc.principal(userAddress).willSendEq(ticketPrice).ustx() ] postConditionMode: 'deny' network: 'mainnet' fee: 100000 }); return response }
imports_or_contract: import { request } from '@stacks/connect'; import { Pc } from '@stacks/transactions'
notes: Exact ticket price required; no change given; auto-assigns ticket ID

name: buy-ticket-for-friend
description: Gift lottery ticket to another address
code: const buyTicketForFriend = async (friendAddress ticketPrice) => { const response = await request('stx_callContract' { contract: `${lotteryAddress}.${lotteryContract}` functionName: 'buy-ticket-for-friend' functionArgs: [principalCV(friendAddress)] postConditions: [ Pc.principal(userAddress).willSendEq(ticketPrice).ustx() ] postConditionMode: 'deny' network: 'mainnet' }); return response }
imports_or_contract: import { request } from '@stacks/connect'; import { Pc principalCV } from '@stacks/transactions'
notes: Sender pays; friend receives ticket; useful for gifting or promotions

name: reveal-lottery-winners
description: Reveal lottery winners (admin only)
code: const revealWinners = async (goal) => { const response = await request('stx_callContract' { contract: `${lotteryAddress}.${lotteryContract}` functionName: 'reveal-winner' functionArgs: [] postConditions: [ Pc.principal(`${lotteryAddress}.${lotteryContract}`).willSendLte(goal).ustx() ] postConditionMode: 'deny' network: 'mainnet' fee: 100000 }); return response }
imports_or_contract: import { request } from '@stacks/connect'; import { Pc } from '@stacks/transactions'
notes: Contract sends prizes; VRF-based random selection; 4 winners for 4-winners lottery

name: get-user-lottery-tickets
description: Get all tickets owned by user
code: const getUserTickets = async (userAddress) => { const response = await fetch(`/api/lottery-4-winners/contract-calls/get-user-tickets?user_address=${userAddress}`); const tickets = await response.json(); return tickets.map(ticket => ({ ticketId: ticket.ticket_id purchaseBlock: ticket.purchase_block isWinner: ticket.is_winner || false }))}
notes: Returns array of ticket objects; check isWinner to highlight winning tickets

name: lottery-winner-animation
description: Confetti animation for lottery winners
code: const showWinnerAnimation = () => { const balloonCount = 20; const balloons = Array.from({length: balloonCount} (__ i) => ({ id: i color: ['#FF6B6B' '#4ECDC4' '#45B7D1' '#FFA07A' '#98D8C8'][i % 5] delay: i * 300 left: Math.random() * 80 + 10 })); return balloons.map(b => ( <div key={b.id} className='balloon' style={{ backgroundColor: b.color animationDelay: `${b.delay}ms` left: `${b.left}%` }} /> ))}
notes: 20 balloons; staggered animation (300ms); 5 colors; random horizontal position

name: multi-wallet-fetch
description: Fetch data for multiple wallets in parallel
code: const fetchMultiWalletData = async (addresses) => { const fetchPromises = addresses.map(address => Promise.all([ fetch(`/api/profile/overview?address=${address}`).then(r => r.json()) fetch(`/api/profile/portfolio?address=${address}`).then(r => r.json()) fetch(`/api/profile/nft_stats?address=${address}`).then(r => r.json()) fetch(`/api/profile/bonding_holdings?address=${address}`).then(r => r.json()) ])); return Promise.all(fetchPromises)}
notes: Parallel fetching; combine results client-side; cache with SWR

name: combine-wallet-portfolios
description: Aggregate portfolio data from multiple wallets
code: const combinePortfolios = (portfolios) => { return portfolios.reduce((combined current) => ({ stxBalance: combined.stxBalance + current.stxBalance totalUsdValue: combined.totalUsdValue + current.totalUsdValue tokens: mergeTokenArrays(combined.tokens current.tokens) nfts: [...combined.nfts ...current.nfts] bondingCurveHoldings: [...combined.bondingCurveHoldings ...current.bondingCurveHoldings] }) {stxBalance: 0 totalUsdValue: 0 tokens: [] nfts: [] bondingCurveHoldings: []})}
notes: Sum balances; merge token arrays (combine duplicates); concat NFT/bonding arrays

name: token-balance-with-price
description: Calculate token balance with USD value
code: const enrichTokenBalance = (token tokenPrices) => { const priceData = tokenPrices.find(p => p.contract_id === token.tokenContract); const priceUsd = priceData?.metrics.price_usd || 0; const realBalance = token.balance / Math.pow(10 token.decimals); const totalUsdValue = priceUsd * realBalance; return { ...token realBalance priceUsd totalUsdValue }}
notes: Divide by 10^decimals for real balance; multiply by USD price; handle missing prices

name: portfolio-doughnut-chart
description: Render portfolio allocation doughnut chart
code: const portfolioChartData = { labels: ['STX' ...tokens.map(t => t.symbol)] datasets: [{ data: [stxValue ...tokens.map(t => t.totalUsdValue)] backgroundColor: ['#FF6384' '#36A2EB' '#FFCE56' '#4BC0C0' '#9966FF' '#FF9F40'] borderWidth: 2 }]}; <Doughnut data={portfolioChartData} options={{plugins: {legend: {position: 'bottom'}}}} />
notes: Use Chart.js; show STX + all fungible tokens; color-coded segments; legend below chart

name: nft-stats-aggregate
description: Aggregate NFT statistics across collections
code: const aggregateNftStats = (nftData) => { const stats = { totalCollections: new Set(nftData.map(nft => nft.collectionId)).size totalNfts: nftData.length totalFloorValue: nftData.reduce((sum nft) => sum + (nft.floorPrice || 0) 0) topCollections: Object.entries(groupBy(nftData 'collectionId')).sort((a b) => b[1].length - a[1].length).slice(0 5) }; return stats}
notes: Count unique collections; sum floor values; rank by NFT count; top 5 collections

name: mobile-accordion-table
description: Mobile-responsive table with accordion rows
code:
const MobileTable = ({data}) => ( {data.map(row => ( {row.name}{row.value}}>
Type: {row.type}
Time: {timeAgo(row.timestamp)}
Amount: {formatNumber(row.amount)}
Status: {row.status}
 ))} )
notes: Desktop: full table; Mobile: accordion with summary in title; details in expandable content

name: conditional-table-render
description: Conditionally render mobile vs desktop tables
code:
const TableView = ({data isMobile}) => { if (isMobile) { return } return ( {columns.map(c => {c.label})}{data.map(row => {cells})}
)}
notes: useMediaQuery to detect mobile; render different components; same data source

name: quick-trade-modal
description: Quick trade modal from activity feed
code: const [isQuickTradeOpen setIsQuickTradeOpen] = useState(false); const [selectedToken setSelectedToken] = useState(null); const openQuickTrade = (token) => { setSelectedToken(token); setIsQuickTradeOpen(true) }; <Modal isOpen={isQuickTradeOpen} onClose={() => setIsQuickTradeOpen(false)}> <QuickTrade token={selectedToken} onSuccess={() => {setIsQuickTradeOpen(false); mutate()}} /> </Modal>
notes: Click row → open modal → trade → mutate() refreshes list

name: themed-sweetalert
description: Theme-aware SweetAlert notifications
code: const showAlert = (title text icon) => { Swal.fire({ icon title text confirmButtonText: 'OK' confirmButtonColor: '#3085d6' background: theme === 'dark' ? '#131C32' : '#fff' color: theme === 'dark' ? '#fff' : '#000' })}
imports_or_contract: import Swal from 'sweetalert2'; import { useTheme } from 'next-themes'
notes: Dark mode support; consistent styling; accessible colors

name: relative-time-display
description: Display relative time (timeAgo)
code: function timeAgo(dateParam: Date): string { const now = new Date(); const date = new Date(dateParam); const seconds = Math.floor((now.getTime() - date.getTime()) / 1000); if (seconds < 60) return `${seconds}s ago`; const minutes = Math.floor(seconds / 60); if (minutes < 60) return `${minutes}m ago`; const hours = Math.floor(minutes / 60); if (hours < 24) return `${hours}h ago`; const days = Math.floor(hours / 24); if (days < 30) return `${days}d ago`; const months = Math.floor(days / 30); if (months < 12) return `${months}M ago`; const years = Math.floor(months / 12); return `${years}y ago`}
notes: Human-readable timestamps; always singular suffix; no pluralization

name: mobile-number-abbreviation
description: Format numbers for mobile display with K/M/B suffixes
code: function formatNumberForMobile(num: number): string { const absNum = Math.abs(num); if (absNum < 1 && absNum > 0) return num.toFixed(2); if (absNum < 1000) return Math.floor(num).toString(); if (absNum < 1000000) { const k = Math.floor(num / 1000); const hundreds = Math.floor((num % 1000) / 100); return k + 'k' + (hundreds || '') } if (absNum < 1000000000) { const m = Math.floor(num / 1000000); const hundredK = Math.floor((num % 1000000) / 100000); return m + 'M' + (hundredK || '') } const b = Math.floor(num / 1000000000); return b + 'B'}
notes: < 1: 2 decimals; < 1K: integer; ≥ 1K: K/M/B suffix with single decimal

name: contract-template-replacement
description: Replace placeholders in Clarity contract template
code: function replacePlaceholders(template params) { let result = template; Object.entries(params).forEach(([key value]) => { const placeholder = new RegExp(`\\$${key}` 'g'); result = result.replace(placeholder String(value)) }); return result}; const modifiedCode = replacePlaceholders(templateCode { TOKEN_NAME: name TOKEN_SYMBOL: symbol TOKEN_SUPPLY: supply TOKEN_DECIMALS: decimals TOKEN_URI: uri DEPLOYER_ADDRESS: deployerAddr })
notes: Use $VARIABLE placeholders; escape regex special chars; convert values to string

name: upload-with-preview
description: Upload image with preview and validation
code: const [preview setPreview] = useState(''); const handleImageUpload = async (e) => { const file = e.target.files[0]; if (file.size > 5 * 1024 * 1024) { alert('File too large (max 5MB)'); return } const reader = new FileReader(); reader.onloadend = () => setPreview(reader.result); reader.readAsDataURL(file); const formData = new FormData(); formData.append('file' file); formData.append('type' 'logo'); const res = await fetch('/api/upload' {method: 'POST' body: formData}); return res.json().url}
notes: Validate size client-side; show preview before upload; FormData for multipart

name: loading-skeleton-pattern
description: Display skeleton loaders during data fetch
code:
const TableSkeleton = () => (
{Array.from({length: 10}).map((__ i) => (
))}
); return isLoading ? :
notes: Match shape of actual content; 10 rows typical; fade-in when data arrives

name: multi-asset-post-conditions
description: Build post-conditions for multi-asset transactions
code: const buildPostConditions = (transfers) => { return transfers.map(transfer => { if (transfer.asset === 'STX') { return Pc.principal(transfer.from).willSendEq(transfer.amount).ustx() } else if (transfer.asset === 'NFT') { return Pc.principal(transfer.from).willSendAsset().nft(transfer.contract transfer.tokenId) } else { return Pc.principal(transfer.from).willSendEq(transfer.amount).ft(transfer.contract transfer.assetName) }})}
notes: Support STX, NFT, and FT in same transaction; map over transfer array; use willSendEq for exact amounts

name: prevent-double-initialization
description: Prevent double initialization in React Strict Mode
code: const initialized = useRef(false); useEffect(() => { if (initialized.current) return; initialized.current = true; fetchData() }, []); const [data setData] = useState(null); const fetchData = async () => { const result = await fetch('/api/data'); setData(result) }
notes: useRef persists across re-renders; protects against React 18 double-mount in dev mode

name: debounced-search-input
description: Debounce search input to reduce API calls
code: const [searchTerm setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [debouncedTerm setDebouncedTerm] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { const timer = setTimeout(() => setDebouncedTerm(searchTerm) 500); return () => clearTimeout(timer) }, [searchTerm]); const {data} = useSWR(debouncedTerm ? `/api/search?q=${debouncedTerm}` : null fetcher)
imports_or_contract: import { useState useEffect } from 'react'; import useSWR from 'swr'
notes: 500ms delay; cancel timer on new input; only fetch when debouncedTerm changes

name: infinite-scroll-pattern
description: Infinite scroll for activity feeds
code:
const [page setPage] = useState(1); const [allData setAllData] = useState([]); const {data} = useSWR(`/api/activities?page=${page}` fetcher); useEffect(() => { if (data?.items) setAllData(prev => [...prev ...data.items]) }, [data]); const loadMore = () => setPage(p => p + 1);
Loading more...
imports_or_contract: import useSWR from 'swr'; import { useState useEffect } from 'react'
notes: Append new data to existing; increment page on scroll; use IntersectionObserver for trigger

name: copy-to-clipboard-with-toast
description: Copy text to clipboard with visual feedback
code: const copyToClipboard = async (text) => { try { await navigator.clipboard.writeText(text); toast.success('Copied to clipboard!' { position: 'bottom-right' duration: 2000 })} catch (err) { toast.error('Failed to copy') }}; <button onClick={() => copyToClipboard(walletAddress)}> <Copy size={16} /> Copy </button>
imports_or_contract: import toast from 'react-hot-toast'; import { Copy } from 'lucide-react'
notes: Use Clipboard API; show toast feedback; graceful error handling; icon for UX

name: confirmation-modal-pattern
description: Confirmation modal for destructive actions
code: const [isConfirmOpen setIsConfirmOpen] = useState(false); const [actionToConfirm setActionToConfirm] = useState(null); const confirmDelete = async () => { await actionToConfirm(); setIsConfirmOpen(false); mutate() }; <Modal isOpen={isConfirmOpen}> <ModalHeader>Confirm Action</ModalHeader> <ModalBody>Are you sure? This cannot be undone.</ModalBody> <ModalFooter> <Button color='danger' onPress={confirmDelete}>Confirm</Button> <Button variant='light' onPress={() => setIsConfirmOpen(false)}>Cancel</Button> </ModalFooter> </Modal>
imports_or_contract: import { Modal ModalHeader ModalBody ModalFooter Button } from '@nextui-org/react'
notes: Store action as callback; confirm modal triggers it; mutate() refreshes data after action

name: zustand-wallet-store
description: Zustand store for wallet state management
code: import create from 'zustand'; interface WalletState { isConnected: boolean; address: string | null; userData: any; connect: () => Promise<void>; disconnect: () => void }; const useWalletStore = create<WalletState>((set) => ({ isConnected: false address: null userData: null connect: async () => { const userData = await connectWallet(); set({isConnected: true address: userData.address userData})} disconnect: () => set({isConnected: false address: null userData: null}) }))
notes: Centralized wallet state; async connect action; disconnect resets state; use throughout app

name: swr-cache-invalidation
description: Invalidate SWR cache on mutation
code: import { useSWRConfig } from 'swr'; const { mutate } = useSWRConfig(); const deleteItem = async (id) => { await fetch(`/api/items/${id}` {method: 'DELETE'}); mutate('/api/items'); mutate(`/api/items/${id}`)}; const updateItem = async (id data) => { await fetch(`/api/items/${id}` {method: 'PUT' body: JSON.stringify(data)}); mutate(`/api/items/${id}`) mutate('/api/items')}
notes: Call mutate() after mutations; revalidate specific keys; cascade to list endpoints

name: multi-filter-state
description: Manage multiple filter states for data tables
code: const [filters setFilters] = useState({ search: '' status: 'all' dateRange: null sortBy: 'date' sortOrder: 'desc' }); const updateFilter = (key value) => setFilters(prev => ({...prev [key]: value})); const filteredData = useMemo(() => { let result = data; if (filters.search) result = result.filter(item => item.name.includes(filters.search)); if (filters.status !== 'all') result = result.filter(item => item.status === filters.status); return result.sort((a b) => filters.sortOrder === 'asc' ? a[filters.sortBy] - b[filters.sortBy] : b[filters.sortBy] - a[filters.sortBy]) }, [data filters])
notes: Single filter object; partial updates; compute filtered data in useMemo; chain filters

name: export-table-to-csv
description: Export table data to CSV file
code: const exportToCSV = (data filename) => { const headers = Object.keys(data[0]); const csvContent = [ headers.join(',') ...data.map(row => headers.map(h => JSON.stringify(row[h] || '')).join(',')) ].join('\\n'); const blob = new Blob([csvContent] {type: 'text/csv;charset=utf-8;'}); const link = document.createElement('a'); link.href = URL.createObjectURL(blob); link.download = filename; link.click()}; <button onClick={() => exportToCSV(tableData 'export.csv')}>Export CSV</button>
notes: Extract headers from first row; JSON.stringify handles commas in values; trigger download
